name: LabGPT
0:
”Alexa, open lab g. p. t.”
”Alexa, launch lab g. p. t.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lab g. p. t.
des:
The LabGPT skill is used inside the laboratories to get answers to domain related information. The answers are generated from GenAI foundation models and is trained on domain specific data.

Features of Skill:
- Provides answers to domain related questions.
- Provides answers to general questions.

Example utterances to launch the skill:
- Alexa, launch Lab GPT
- Alexa, open lab GPT

Few example utterances that can be used after launching the skill:
- Tell me, when was rifapentine method run
- Answer this, What is the chemical formulae of chocolate
- Answer this question, Ask a general question

The skill is currently supported only in English (US) and is available only in US, UK, and India regions.

Disclaimer:
- The skill capabilities are very specific to the use-case & industry and may not be helpful to all audience.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
